body_html:
Hi @ebrevdo, sorry I've just gotten time to try this out.

This approach seems to work, but could you speak for how fast this compared to the usual method of feeding single placeholder for Tensors that don't have varying sizes? I am concerned that this method, while clean once inside a helper function call, might be slow when training.

body:
Hi @ebrevdo, sorry I've just gotten time to try this out.

This approach seems to work, but could you speak for how fast this compared to the usual method of feeding single placeholder for Tensors that don't have varying sizes? I am concerned that this method, while clean once inside a helper function call, might be slow when training.
